comments: Or 1/(4 sqrt(3)), which should look familiar to anyone who has studied Ramanujan's approximation for the partition numbers (see Conway and Guy). - From Alonso del Arte, May 19 2011
references: J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, The Book of Numbers, Copernicus Press, NY, 1996, p. 95.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
